contains.name: programOrCampaign
contains.description: An overarching context for a set of related projects. Projects may be related in the context of a common funding source, a common thematic or conceptual framework, or other such context. Note that projects do not need to be created in the context of a programOrCampaign, but that a programOrCampaign can be a container for 1:many projects. Entity equates to OWL 2.0 Class object.

property.name: programId
property.description: The identifier of the initiative (e.g., overarching research program or funding initiative) encompassing the project

property.name: programName
property.description: The initiative (e.g., overarching research program) encompassing the project (e.g., Horizon 2020)

property.name: programDescription
property.description: General description/summary  of the Research Program or funding initiative.

contains.name: project
contains.description: A project is an overarching context for a set of associated activities which contribute to a specific objective. Entity equates to OWL 2.0 Class object.

property.name: projectId
property.description: Globally unique identifier(GUID)for the project. System generated.

property.name: projectExternalId
property.description: The identifier of the project in an external database or repository.

property.name: projectOriginalRepository
property.description: The name of the project database in which a project was first registered or published. Allows traceability of a project in multiple databases to it's original registration repository.

property.name: projectDateCreated
property.description: The date and time that the record was created in the database. Uses the ISO 8601:2004 (E) dateTime standard

property.name: projectLastUpdatedDate
property.description: The date and time that the record was last updated in the database. Uses the ISO 8601:2004 (E) dateTime standard

property.name: projectName
property.description: Short name or title of the project.

property.name: projectAim
property.description: The primary aim, goal or objective of the project.

property.name: projectDescription
property.description: Abstract or long description of the project.

property.name: hasTag
property.description: List of tags to assist with searching and filtering.

property.name: difficultyLevel
property.description: Assessed class of project difficulty for untrained participants to undertake. This attribute is used to assist with searching and filtering.

property.name: dct:keyword
property.description: Keywords (comma separated) which are indexed and aid in searching for and finding projects.

property.name: projectStatus
property.description: The activity status of the project.

property.name: projectStartDate
property.description: The actual date that the project began. Uses the ISO 8601:2004 (E) dateTime standard

property.name: projectEndDate
property.description: The actual date that the project ended. Uses the ISO 8601:2004 (E) dateTime standard

property.name: projectDuration
property.description: The duration or elapsed time over which a project was undertaken. This would typically be derived as the difference in a unit of time between the start and end dates of a project, but may be infinite (if no end date applies) or explicit (if duration is given with no end date specified.

property.name: cosi:belongsToProgramme
property.description: Name of the Programme that the project is associated with.

property.name: projectScienceType
property.description: The category of science represented by the project. Where the project fits into the landscape of science.

property.name: projectIntendedOutcomes
property.description: Project outcomes

property.name: projectImage
property.description: Image(s) representing the project

property.name: projectLogoImage
property.description: Logo image representing the project

property.name: projectBannerImage
property.description: Banner image to representing the project

property.name: projectUrl
property.description: An HTTP URL to an external web site for the project.

property.name: projectGeographicLocation
property.description: User-defined geospatial representation point location(s) of the project. Point locations are typically represented as map pins. Uses OGC GeoAPI (09-083r3) standard.

property.name: projectPinLatitude
property.description: Latitude coordinate of the center of the project area. Typically this is where the project is hosted, e.g., a home institution. Uses OGC GeoAPI (09-083r3) standard.

property.name: projectPinLongitude
property.description: Longitude  coordinate of the center of the project area. Typically this is where the project is hosted, e.g., a home institution. Uses OGC GeoAPI (09-083r3) standard.

property.name: projectGeographicCoverage
property.description: User-defined geospatial representation(s) of the project area footprint/extent. Coverage is typically represented in a GeoJSON object which has a centroid coordinate ('centre') and a definition of the boundary of the shape. Uses OGC GeoAPI (09-083r3) standard.

property.name: projectGeographicCoverageCentroidLatitude
property.description: Latitude coordinate of the centroid of the project extent area. Latitude coordinate in geographic decimal degrees for the center or home base of the project best representing the project's location as a point. Uses OGC GeoAPI (09-083r3) standard.

property.name: projectGeographicCoverageCentroidLongitude
property.description: Longitude coordinate of the centroid of the project extent area. Longitude coordinate in geographic decimal degrees for the center or home base of the project best representing the project's location as a point. Uses OGC GeoAPI (09-083r3) standard.

property.name: unRegions
property.description: Select list based on UN M.49 coding classification, Geographical supranational regions. Used for enabling regionalized views of projects where projects are active, to make searching for projects more regionally relevant for some users.

property.name: language
property.description: The encoding language used for the project. Uses Unicode Standard UTF-8 (ISO/IEC 10646:2014 plus Amendment 1).

property.name: contactPoint
property.description: The principal contact point for the project.

property.name: contactName
property.description: The name of the agent appointed as the contact for a project.

synonymTerms.nameOfStandard: Friend of a Friend Vocabulary Specification

property.name: meansOfContact
property.description: The method(s) described for making contact with the project.

synonymTerms.nameOfStandard: Friend of a Friend Vocabulary Specification

property.name: contactDetails
property.description: Detailed contact information for a project.

synonymTerms.nameOfStandard: Friend of a Friend Vocabulary Specification

property.name: contactPointType
property.description: The type of contact point for a project.

synonymTerms.nameOfStandard: Friend of a Friend Vocabulary Specification

property.name: projectLocality
property.description: Other textual location specification

property.name: projectResponsibleParty
property.description: The party responsible for the project.

contains.name: projectResponsiblePartyId
contains.description: The identifier of a party (eg. Organisation) that is responsible for implementing/conducting the project. This may be a foreign key to the party GUID stored in another database entity. Typically system generated.

contains.name: projectResponsiblePartyName
contains.description: Name of the primary organization responsible for hosting or implementing the project.

property.name: projectAssociatedParty
property.description: A party associated with the project with a particular association role.

contains.name: projectAssociatedPartyId
contains.description: The id of an associated party. This may be a foreign key to the party information stored in another database entity.

contains.name: projectAssociatedPartyName
contains.description: Short text name or title of a party (eg. Organisation) associated with the project and performing a role in the project.

contains.name: projectUsFederalSponsor
contains.description: Name(s) of US Federal entity(s) providing funding to the project
vocabulary: Department of Health and Human Services
Department of Housing and Urban Development

contains.name: projectAssociatedPartyRole
contains.description: A role which a party (eg. Organisation) associated with the project undertakes. Each associated party listed should have a role.

property.name: participationFees
property.description: An entity for specifying details of participation fees if they are applicable.

contains.name: participationFeeApplicable
contains.description: Flag to indicate whether participation fees are applicable.

contains.name: participationFeeAmount
contains.description: The currency amount for a fee to participate in the project.

property.name: projectHowToParticipate
property.description: Free text description of how people can get involved in the project. Textual instructions for joining the project.

property.name: projectTask
property.description: Tasks of the participant (Short description of what needs to be done by the participant, written in a way that is human readable/friendly)

property.name: projectOutcome
property.description: The outcome(s) achieved or delivered by a project.

property.name: scientificProcessInvolved
property.description: Parts of the process of science that participants exercise

property.name: numberOfScientificPublications
property.description: Number of peer reviewed publications referencing the project and/or project datasets.

property.name: numberOfOtherPublications
property.description: Number of reports/grey literature publications referencing the project and/or project datasets.

property.name: projectAdditionalInformation
property.description: Supplemental information for any project-specific data administrators want to make available

property.name: projectCountry
property.description: The country in which the project is being undertaken. This may be multiple countries. Select list of countries. Used for enabling nationalised views of projects in order to make searchability and applicability of projects more nationally relevant for users. Applies the ISO 3166: 2006 standard for country names.
vocabulary: Saint Helena, Ascension and Tristan da Cunha
South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands
United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland (the)

property.name: projectEquipment
property.description: Required or suggested equipment

property.name: projectExternalLinks
property.description: URL for links to any external resources associated with a project. These may include links to project mobile apps, social media pages, etc.

property.name: projectFunding
property.description: Type(s) and source(s) of funding contributions to the project.

contains.name: projectFundingSource
contains.description: Type of name of the contributor(s)of funding to the project

contains.name: projectFundingSourcePercentageAmount
contains.description: Percentage of funding contribution for each funding source or funding contributor

contains.name: projectFundingSourceCurrencyAmount
contains.description: Actual amount in local country currency of funding contribution for each funding source or funding contributor

contains.name: projectFundingSourceType
contains.description: Type of funding source(s) contributing to the project

vocabulary.name: fundingSourceTypeSubsetB
vocabularySubset: Direct Funding from a Federal Agency
Direct Funding from the Federal Government

property.name: projectParticipants
property.description: Number of project participants.

contains.name: projectParticipantsNumberOfActive
contains.description: Number of active participants based on project's definition of activity

contains.name: projectParticipantsTotalRegistered
contains.description: Total number of registered participants

contains.name: projectParticipantAge
contains.description: The age range classe(s) of participants

property.name: projectPlannedEndDate
property.description: The date that the project is planned to end. Applicable for projects operating over a defined period of time. The date on which the project ended or will end. Uses the ISO 8601:2004 (E) dateTime standard

property.name: projectPlannedStartDate
property.description: The date that the project is planned to commence. The date on which the project began or will begin. Uses the ISO 8601:2004 (E) dateTime standard

property.name: projectResearchType
property.description: Area of research covered by the project (e.g., ecological research)

property.name: projectScientificCollaborators
property.description: List of scientific collaborators; i.e. scientists or academic departments using the data collected

contains.name: activitySet
contains.description: An activity list comprises a set (array) of activities associated with a single project.

contains.name: activity
contains.description: An activity comprises a schema definition which represents a specific data collection protocol and a schema definition for the metadata associated with all protocols. In the context of an activity, these exist as a singular pair. Usage of an activity is always made in the context of an event, ie. A non-persistent time-based usage of an observational data schema. Observational data schemas are domain and protocol specific, and may be published in other repositories.

contains.name: datasetMetadataSchema
contains.description: The datasetMetadataSchema (DDM) describes the metadata pertaining to the specific observationalDataSchema selected and it's associated data. There is a 1:1 relationship between the datasetMetadataSchema and the observationalDataSchema. The datasetMetadataSchema is consistent for all classes of observationalDataDomains.

property.name: dcterms:identifier
property.description: Persistent identifier of a dataset (associated to the project). Should equate to the datasetExternalId if data is stored in an external repository.

property.name: dcterms:dateSubmitted
property.description: The date a dataset submission was published into a receiving system. Uses the ISO 8601:2004 (E) dateTime standard

property.name: dcterms:modified
property.description: The most recent dateTime at which the resource was changed. Uses the ISO 8601:2004 (E) dateTime standard

property.name: datasetStatus
property.description: Indicator of the current status of a dataset (e.g. if it already published)

property.name: dcterms:title
property.description: The name of the dataset for discovery and citation purposes.

property.name: dcterms:abstract
property.description: Abstract or description of the dataset.

property.name: dcterms:accessRights
property.description: Category of rights to use IP contained in the dataset or a type of use applied to the dataset.

property.name: dcterms:bibliographicCitation
property.description: Format to be structured as follows: 'Author/Rightsholder. (Year). Title of data set (Version number) [Description of form]. Retrieved from https://<website url>'.	The attribution text string to be cited by people who use the dataset.

property.name: dcterms:rightsHolder
property.description: The name of the organisation which is the legal custodian of the dataset.

property.name: dcterms:license
property.description: License applied to the dataset.
vocabulary: Creative Commons Attribution Non-commercial Share Alike (CC-BY-NC-SA)

property.name: datasetEncodingLanguage
property.description: The machine language the dataset and associated metadata is encoded in. Uses Unicode Standard UTF-8 (ISO/IEC 10646:2014 plus Amendment 1).

property.name: datesetStartDate
property.description: The date on which the dataset collection survey commences. This may reflect the earliest record in the dataset or when a survey is open to begin data recording. This date may be => the projectStartDate. Uses the ISO 8601:2004 (E) dateTime standard.

property.name: datasetEndDate
property.description: The date on which the dataset collection survey concluded. Uses the ISO 8601:2004 (E) dateTime standard.

property.name: methodType
property.description: The type of methodology or sampling protocol used to collect the dataset.

property.name: methodSpecification
property.description: Details of the methodology or sampling protocol used to collect the dataset.

contains.name: dcterms:samplingProtocol
contains.description: The name of the methodology or sampling protocol used to collect the dataset.
vocabulary: Fauna survey - Aerial distance sampler method
Fauna survey - Strip transect aerial survey
Riparian condition assessment - Rapid Appraisal of Riparian Condition (RARC)
Water quality - Standardised physical/chemical attribute measurements

contains.name: methodAbstract
contains.description: Description of the methodology or sampling protocol used to collect the dataset.

contains.name: methodUrl
contains.description: URL address of an officially published article which describes the methodology or sampling protocol used to collect the dataset.

contains.name: methodDocUrl
contains.description: URL link to an uploaded document artefact which describes the methodology or sampling protocol used to collect the dataset.

property.name: dataAccessMethod
property.description: A list of available methods for people to access the dataset.
vocabulary: Open access structured raw data download from this system
Open access opaque raw data file attached in this system
Limited structured raw data access in this system - via request (subject to embargo)
Opaque raw data file attached in this system - via request
Open access structured raw data download from external source
Closed access structured raw data download from external source

property.name: datasetUpdateFrequency
property.description: How often the dataset is updated.

property.name: datasetExternalUrl
property.description: Web location where the dataset will be published.

property.name: dcat:downloadURL
property.description: A URL from which dataset observation records can be accessed and downloaded.

property.name: datasetGeographicCoverage
property.description: Geographic/spatial scope of coverage of the collection sites of data records within the dataset. Uses OGC GeoAPI (09-083r3) standard.

property.name: dataAccuracyDeclarations
property.description: Generalised categories that best reflect the accuracy of records in the dataset.

category.name: spatialAccuracy
category.description: A generalised category that best reflects the least spatially accurate record in the dataset.

category.name: temporalAccuracy
category.description: A generalised category that best reflects the least accurate record in the dataset in respect to date of the observation.

category.name: speciesIdentification
category.description: A generalised category that best reflects the least accurate record in the dataset for species identification. Choose 'Not applicable' species fields are not included in the dataset.

category.name: nonTaxonomicAccuracy
category.description: A generalised category that best reflects the least accurate record in the dataset in respect to non-biodiversity attributes.

property.name: dataQualityAssuranceMethod
property.description: Description of the types of data quality assurance methods that were applied in capturing, curating and managing the dataset.

property.name: dataQualityAssuranceDescription
property.description: Detailed description of the methods used to quality assure the dataset both during capture and post processing. This is important for data users to understand the processes applied to the data to verify or enhance it's quality for use.

property.name: usageGuide
property.description: Description of any constraints and biases in the dataset which are associated with how the data collection methodology was applied, eg. Concentration of data points along access networks, targeted/non-random approaches causing bias towards certain factors at the expense of other factors, etc.

property.name: activityCount
property.description: Number of data recording events in the dataset

property.name: dataManagementPlan
property.description: Data management plan details

contains.name: isDataManagementPolicyDocumented
contains.description: Indicator of whether a data management plan has been prepared for the dataset.

contains.name: dataManagementPolicyDescription
contains.description: Description of data management policy

contains.name: dataManagementPolicyURL
contains.description: Link to data management policy description

contains.name: dataManagementPolicyDocument
contains.description: Document describing data management policy

contains.name: dataManagementPrinciplesConformance
contains.description: Assessment of the conformance of the data management principles applied to the dataset with standard GEOlabels.

contains.name: observationalData
contains.description: The observationalDataDomain contains an array of different domain schemas (eg. biodiversity, water, atmosphere, ecology, geology, geomorphology, astronomy, etc.). Each domain will contain an array of standard protocols which apply in that domain context. The domains listed are not a comprehensive list and are expected to be appended to over time as new domains are specified and appropriate samplingProtocol standards are defined for them. This class object serves only to structurally differentiate and describe the different domains and is not a structural element of the observationalDataModel (ODM).

applicableDataStandards.description: Darwin Core is a standard which is used worldwide in biodiversity informatics community for recording and sharing biodiversity occurrence data.
Audubon Core provides a standard for recording image information and is widely used .

applicableDataStandards.applicableStandardName: Water ML / Water Data Transfer Format

applicableDataStandards.description: MarineTLO is a top-level ontology for the marine domain (also applicable to the terrestrial domain).
